content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. For this negotiation, let's focus solely on the rental price of this exceptional 50 square meter apartment in Munich's vibrant city center – close to all essential amenities. I have high expectations, so let's see if your proposed price matches mine.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I really like the apartment. I am a student and I am looking for a quiet place to live in the city center. To rent the apartment, I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While your interest in the apartment is appreciated, Emilia Müller, I must regretfully inform you that my initial thoughts on a reasonable rental price were significantly higher. I don't want to continue the negotiation because this proposed price falls short of my expectations. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
